# applicationDidUpdate(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the app’s windows did update.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func applicationDidUpdate(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: A notification named [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSApplication/didUpdateNotification]. Calling the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotification/object] method of this notification returns the `NSApplication` object itself.

## Related Documentation

- **updateWindows()**: Sends an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/update()] message to each onscreen window.

## Managing Windows

- **applicationWillUpdate(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the app is about to update its windows.
- **applicationShouldHandleReopen(_:hasVisibleWindows:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if the app responds to reopen AppleEvents.
